attributes.action: Close the Bolton (sub-contracted) office of the CSA, and re-allocate the cases to experienced case workers at other offices, preferably offices who are actually DWP and not sub-contracted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The numbers of complaints about CSA at Bolton has reached drastic proportions. Even MP's are complaining about it now. Close it down and have proper case workers, with years of experience, to look after these case.
